source.sql: SELECT plant_cd, batch_no, blend_date, mcs_no, mat_col, mat_lot_s, mat_lot_l, order_number, sfc_cd, mcs_name, bcard_qty, blend_s_s, blend_l_s, meins, machine_no, zone_cd, op_cd, model_cd, model_name, create_dt, blend_time, weight_date, weight_time, work_center FROM mes.dmpd_bcard_blend_info WHERE ifstatus = 'PENDING' ORDER BY blend_date, blend_time NULLS FIRST
